name: Amalgama
description:
Amalgama is a Digital Consulting Company focused on helping companies take advantage of technology in order to increase their client base, improve efficiency, and build innovative products. In Amalgama we work under Scrum methodology with a twist: we call it Gamadology. It is based on lean development, prioritizing the most important tasks of the project based on optimized effort plus best ROI. The scope of the project is defined as a guide but not as a contract.
Our headquaters are located in Buenos Aires Argentina, but we are also represented in Coral Springs, Florida.
